column1: Narrator : An immense imperial boat berths CAPITAINE. Its guns pointed at NOMBATEAU, a sailor appears on the deck.

column3: OtherSpeak : Here comes those rascals again !

column1: OtherSpeak : Oh my ! You wouldn’t be CAPITAINE ?
column2: OtherSpeak : What brings you to those seas ?

column1: OtherSpeak : One of the most trust worthy captain on the ocean I heard !
column3: OtherSpeak : You don’t look like a saint, but not like a pirate either.
column4: OtherSpeak : Your head is on all wanter posters of the kingdom !
column7: OtherSpeak : You won’t find this here
column8: OtherSpeak : Those are tales. To make kids dream.
column11: OtherSpeak : Faut prouver que vous la méritez, notre aide.

column1: OtherSpeak : Can i be of any help ?
column4: OtherSpeak : The captain’s gonna want to speak with you…
column7: OtherSpeak : Those myths come up DIRECTIONTOFORMULA

column4: OtherSpeak : You’re not in position to give orders

column1: OtherSpeak : Don’t mind if I do !
column2: OtherSpeak : Let’s not abuse our generosity…

column13: OtherSpeak : The infamous CAPITAINE ! It would be a pleasure

column8: OtherSpeak : I may have some available men….
OtherSpeak : Some have been twiddling their thumbs
column18: OtherSpeak : I was the last one
OtherSpeak : Let me take you back to my boss

column6: PlayerSpeak : Il n'y a plus rien.

column1: OtherSpeak : There’s BOUNTY gold coins on your head

column3: Choice : It’s out of the question (attaquer)

column1: OtherSpeak : Good… Your dept is clear

column2: OtherSpeak : You’ll need to come with us. Prison awaits.

column4: Narrator : CAPITAINE is on the beach. Soldiers arrive form afar
